name: Pseudoachondroplasia
HOP_symptoms: small epiphyses of the phalanges of the hand

name: Pycnodysostosis
HOP_symptoms: abnormality of pelvic girdle bone morphology

name: Otospondylomegaepiphyseal Dysplasia, Autosomal Recessive
HOP_symptoms: abnormal form of the vertebral bodies
aplasia/hypoplasia of the capital femoral epiphysis

name: Otopalatodigital Syndrome, Type I
HOP_symptoms: delayed closure of the anterior fontanelle

name: Leri-Weill Dyschondrosteosis
HOP_symptoms: abnormality of pelvic girdle bone morphology

name: Atelosteogenesis, Type Ii
HOP_symptoms: ulnar deviation of the hand or of fingers of the hand

name: Exostoses, Multiple, Type Ii
HOP_symptoms: protuberances at ends of long bones

name: Bruck Syndrome 1
HOP_symptoms: abnormal form of the vertebral bodies

name: Schneckenbecken Dysplasia
HOP_symptoms: abnormal form of the vertebral bodies

name: Cataracts, Growth Hormone Deficiency, Sensory Neuropathy, Sensorineural Hearing Loss, and Skeletal Dysplasia
Retinitis Pigmentosa with or Without Skeletal Anomalies
Gurrieri Syndrome
HOP_symptoms: decreased anterioposterior diameter of lumbar vertebral bodies

name: Spinal Muscular Atrophy with Congenital Bone Fractures 2
HOP_symptoms: increased variability in muscle fiber diameter

name: Brachydactyly, Mononen Type
HOP_symptoms: aplasia of the distal phalanx of the 2nd finger
absent distal phalanx of the 2nd toe

name: Polycystic Lipomembranous Osteodysplasia with Sclerosing Leukoencephalopathy 2
Long Bones of Lower Limb Cancer
Hypophosphatasia
HOP_symptoms: skin dimple over apex of long bone angulation

name: Pulmonary Fibrosis and/or Bone Marrow Failure, Telomere-Related, 2
Spondyloepiphyseal Dysplasia Tarda, X-Linked
HOP_symptoms: hypoplasia of the capital femoral epiphysis
hump-shaped mound of bone in central and posterior portions of vertebral endplate

name: Avascular Necrosis of Femoral Head, Primary, 1
HOP_symptoms: avascular necrosis of the capital femoral epiphysis

name: Desbuquois Dysplasia 1
HOP_symptoms: aplasia/hypoplasia of the abdominal wall musculature

name: Acromesomelic Dysplasia, Hunter-Thompson Type
HOP_symptoms: abnormality of pelvic girdle bone morphology
shortening of all middle phalanges of the fingers
shortening of all proximal phalanges of the fingers

name: Spondyloperipheral Dysplasia
HOP_symptoms: abnormality of pelvic girdle bone morphology
cone-shaped epiphyses of the phalanges of the hand
shortening of all middle phalanges of the fingers
short distal phalanx of the 5th finger
shortening of all proximal phalanges of the fingers
short distal phalanx of the 3rd finger
short distal phalanx of the 4th finger
short distal phalanx of the 2nd finger

name: Fanconi Anemia, Complementation Group W
HOP_symptoms: abnormality of the periventricular white matter

name: Calvarial Doughnut Lesions with Bone Fragility
Myotonia with Skeletal Abnormalities and Mental Retardation
HOP_symptoms: decreased anterioposterior diameter of lumbar vertebral bodies

name: Hypogonadism, Male, with Mental Retardation and Skeletal Anomalies
HOP_symptoms: abnormal form of the vertebral bodies

name: Osteogenesis Imperfecta Congenita, Microcephaly, and Cataracts
HOP_symptoms: bowing of limbs due to multiple fractures
